July 1, 1897 The Tithe; Its Use and Abuse.
-

     "The light which the Lord has given me on this subject, is that the means in the treasury for the support of the ministers in the different fields is not to be used for any other purpose. If an honest tithe were paid, and the money coming 
                                                                           87
into the treasury were carefully guarded, the ministers would receive a just wage. . . .
